Package com.o3dr.android.client.apis

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Api.Builder<T extends Api>  
    CapabilityApi.FeatureSupportListener  
    ControlApi.ManualControlStateListener
    Used to monitor the state of manual control for the vehicle.
    ExperimentalApi.IVideoStreamCallback
    Callback for directly observing video stream.
    GimbalApi.GimbalOrientationListener  
    MissionApi.LoadingCallback<T>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Api
    Common interface for the drone set of api classes.
    CalibrationApi
    Provides access to the calibration specific functionality.
    CameraApi
    Provides support to control generic camera functionality Created by Fredia Huya-Kouadio on 10/11/15.
    CapabilityApi
    Allows to query the capabilities offered by the vehicle.
    CapabilityApi.FeatureIds
    Defines the set of feature ids.
    ControlApi
    Provides access to the vehicle control functionality.
    ExperimentalApi
    Contains drone commands with no defined interaction model yet.
    FollowApi
    Provides access to the Follow me api.
    GimbalApi  
    GimbalApi.GimbalOrientation
    Stores the gimbal orientation angles.
    MissionApi
    Provides access to missions specific functionality.
    VehicleApi
    Provides access to the vehicle specific functionality.
